animeTitle: Last Exile: Ginyoku no Fam - Adjournment
animeDescription: "First adjournment" (episode 9.5) is a recap of the first nine episodes of Last Exile: Ginyoku no Fam.  "Second adjournment" (episode 15.5) is a recap of the first Last Exile series.
